text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Everybody ready?!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: All right, here we go... Let's party<n>hard at Bubblyland!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Wait, why are we in swimsuits?!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Because this is a pool resort, of<n>course. ♪ They let you enter
the disco<n>and cafes in your swimsuit here! Plus,<n>you feel
the vibes more!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Tickezo, are you sure you don't want<n>to buy a swimsuit?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Yep! Our school-issue swimsuit is<n>durable! It's perfect for
swimming as<n>hard as you can, so it's good enough<n>for
me!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
If you say so! Now come on! Let's<n>enjoy ourselves to the
fullest!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
(Wh-wh-what should I do? There's<n>no way I can get any
training done<n>here!)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
(In fact, I don't see training grounds<n>anywhere, and all the
visitors just<n>look like they're here to have fun...)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
(What did Maruzen even mean when<n>she said I could get
out of my slump<n>here?)

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
You know, Spe... There's only one<n>thing you should be
doing here today,<n>and it's not running.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: It's... not? Then what is it...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Wooooo!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Dancing?!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
C'mon, Spe! Let's go up on that<n>platform and get our
groove on!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Huh?! Uh, you want to go over to<n>that... dance stage thing? I
don't<n>know. I'm just, uh, I don't know<n>what to do on
one!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Don't worry! Once you start dancing,<n>none of that'll matter!
It'll be fun!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Besides, Maruzen said she wanted<n>you to have fun and
enjoy yourself to<n>the max today, so let's gooo!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Come on, Spe! Just humor me and<n>come dance with us! ♪

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Whaaat?! W-wait a second!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Ohhh! What should I do?! I don't<n>know how this dance goes
at all!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha! This isn't a concert, so don't<n>worry about
choreography or<n>anything! It'll be fine—just dance your<n>
heart out!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: D-dance my heart out?! U-umm, like<n>this?!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yep, yep! Just like that! Don't forget<n>to cheer too! Wooooo!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: W-wooooo?!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, wave that fan! One, two! One,<n>two! That's the spirit!
Looking good,<n>Spe!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
O-one, two. One, two... Hehe. Just<n>what are we doing?
Ahaha!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: ...Hehe, thanks, Tickezo. You two are<n>looking fine! ♪

text_block_list.name: Man A
text_block_list.text: Huh?! Maruzensky's here!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Oh my, my! Are you having fun,<n>everyone?

text_block_list.name: Visitors
text_block_list.text: Wooooo!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Let's all lose ourselves to the magic<n>of the disco! Woohoo!

The excitement reaches new heights<n>as the entire venue
goes wild to<n>Maruzensky's call!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
(People are smiling, music's playing,<n>and everything's so
bright and<n>sparkly! It feels like a dream!)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (What is this feeling? It's beensuch a long time since I've felt thisway...)

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Spe! Don't forget to wave your fan!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Okay! Ehehe! ♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hehe. ♪

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Aaah! Nata de coco's the best!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Hey, have you guys gone down that<n>waterslide yet? It's so
fast and super<n>fun!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Wow, it's huge! Just listen to those<n>screams, though. Is it
really safe?!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Look over there! Another dance<n>podium! It's called a water
disco,<n>'cause you can dance surrounded by<n>water
fountains!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Oooh! So many girls are dancing on it!<n>It looks like lots of
fun!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
This park is filled to the brim with<n>delicious food and fun
things to do... I<n>never knew such a place existed.
Ding, dong....

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
It's happy hour at Bubbly Cafe,<n>where you can enjoy our<n>
all-you-can-eat tiramisu. Come and<n>join us!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
All-you-can-eat tiramisu?! No way! Oh<n>my gosh, where's
the cafe?!
